channel.title: microbiology on Monash Bioinformatics Platform
channel.description: Recent content in microbiology on Monash Bioinformatics Platform

item.title: Genomic Epidemiology for Bacteria Outbreaks
item.description: Epidemiology studies using whole genome sequencing (WGS) have been popularized because they allow a very detailed association of phenotypes to a range of genomic components, as well as they allow the initial classification of isolates with higher accuracy than traditional methods

item.title: How bioinformatics and WGS has transformed international pathogen surveillance
item.description: Advances in whole genome sequencing and bioinformatics have transformed public health and clinical microbiology
